</div>
### Features

- [x] Support rss feeds
- [ ] support twitter
- [ ] support youtube

### Install

Simply run:
`brew install rss-cli`
Or
`pip install rss-cli`

### TODO:

- [ ] support twitter
- [ ] support youtube
- [ ] speed the process

### Options

| Options          | Description    |
| ---------------- | -------------- |
| (No option)      | Run the app    |
| `-a`, `--add`    | Add a link     |
| `-r`, `--remove` | Remove a link  |
| `-l`, `--list`   | Show all links |
